channel.title: Gaussian Process on Luyao Peng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gaussian Process on Luyao Peng's Blog

item.title: Gaussian Process in Deep and Wide Model in Automated Essay Scoring
item.description: Consider a two-layer feed-forward NN (but it is easy to extend to deep NN more than 2 layers without loss of generality and to deep and wide (in blue color)): Goal: Let GP to decide latent functions in NN Provide uncertainty of predictions Ensemble of infinite number of 2-layer NNs (see page5) Innovations: Consider sigmoid output function rather than linear output function in Lee et al.
